trans-unit.target: Generate data types that use the Data Contract Serializer for serialization and deserialization

trans-unit.source: -= EXAMPLES =-
trans-unit.target: -= EXAMPLES =-

trans-unit.source: dotnet-svcutil -u ServiceReference
trans-unit.target: dotnet-svcutil -u ServiceReference

trans-unit.source: - Update existing web service reference named ServiceReference. The command need to be executed under directory which contains the project file.
trans-unit.target: - Update existing web service reference named ServiceReference. The command need to be executed under directory which contains the project file.

trans-unit.source: dotnet-svcutil http://example.com/service.svc?wsdl
trans-unit.target: dotnet-svcutil http://example.com/service.svc?wsdl

trans-unit.source: - Generate client code from a running service or online metadata documents.
trans-unit.target: - Generate client code from a running service or online metadata documents.

trans-unit.source: dotnet-svcutil *.wsdl *.xsd --language:C#
trans-unit.target: dotnet-svcutil *.wsdl *.xsd --language:C#

trans-unit.source: - Generate client code in Visual Basic from local metadata documents.
trans-unit.target: - Generate client code in Visual Basic from local metadata documents.

trans-unit.source: dotnet-svcutil http://example.com/service.svc?wsdl -edb -n "*,MyApplication.ServiceReference1" -ct MyLibrary.MyCollection`1 -r "{{MyLibrary,1.0.0}}"
trans-unit.target: dotnet-svcutil http://example.com/service.svc?wsdl -edb -n "*,MyApplication.ServiceReference1" -ct MyLibrary.MyCollection`1 -r "{{MyLibrary,1.0.0}}"

trans-unit.target: A mapping from a WSDL or XML Schema targetNamespace to a CLR namespace.
